Articles.Content:
![QGNg0Fw.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/QGNg0Fw.jpg)

DEMOCRACY. DOWN WITH COMMUNISM.

She handles like a beast, and she is as stable as hell. She also has a huge bomb bay activated by pressing 2 along with a 200 m/s sea level cruising speed and a ridiculous fuel load.

Press 1 on take off to retract the rear retainer gears.

After reading those instructions, you're ready to fly this babe.

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/rs70bx33bqpa36l/B-47X-3.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/rs70bx33bqpa36l/B-47X-3.craft?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-23T23:29:40Z" title="05/23/2015 11:29  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 23, 2015</time> by andrew123**
Cockpit and wings driving me insane

> 
> Cockpit and wings driving me insane

It's called lower part count. I sacrificed some aesthetics to get more fuel in the wings, and the cockpit is the lowest drag solution. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) :P

> 
> It's called lower part count. I sacrificed some aesthetics to get more fuel in the wings, and the cockpit is the lowest drag solution. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) :P

Hmmm, well yes I do agree

The wings are just no... although very clever placing. 

Could you make one with tidier wings but with more fuel tanks/part clipped ones?
